comments:
build i0420-0800

I was typing in some code, I had strings which needed to be externalized, I
formatted my code. (all without saving) Then I did a ctrl-1 to quickfix the
non-nls'd string (I chose that option in the menu) and I got the following NPE
in my console. (no change in the editor)

I moved the caret to another line and then back again (all without saving the
file) and when I hit ctrl-1 and chose "externalize strings" it worked ok.
